WINNERS AT WAR

Survivor Turns 20

After twenty years and thirty-nine seasons, Survivor has finally delivered on a long anticipated "all winners" season. The cast includes longtime Surivor favorites like Rob Mariano and Parvati Shallow as well as more recent winners who grew up watching Rob and Parvati on TV.

Since the new season is all about existing relationships and "old school" vs "new school" players, I thought it would be fun to plot out all the cast members' histories on the show. Each circle represents a season and green circles represent wins. Look for circles aligned vertically to see who's played together; seaason 20 (Heroes and Villains) was the biggest reunion, brining together 4 winners.

by @lggorman
